title: FS: Griffith T204, some T206 - both raw and graded. EPDG/SOV460 Prices Lowered
author: npa589

posts.post_title: FS: Griffith T204, some T206 - both raw and graded. EPDG/SOV460 Prices Lowered
posts.post_content:
Prices are as delivered WITH insurance via Paypal Payment Owed. Please add 2% for paypal goods. E-mails will take precedence over PMs, so please e-mail.

E-mail: [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]

T206 Raw:

Clark Griffith EPDG Portrait - You might notice it's trimmed. It also has something written, almost looks like crayon. No creases at all though, so that's a plus. 60$

T206:

SGC 50 Sovereign 460: Orval Overall Hands at Waist - $145
SGC 10 EPDG: Orval Overall Portrait - $45
SGC 10 SC Fact. 42 Overstrike: Nap Lajoie With Bat - $85
SGC 50 SC Fact. 42 Overstrike: Johnny Evers Chicago Shirt - $175

PSA 2 Sovereign 460: Wildfire Schulte Back View - 65$
PSA 3 EPDG: Harry Steinfeldt Portrait $140
PSA 1.5 Sovereign 460: Tom Needham $50

T204:

SGC 10 Clark Griffith - $235
